DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine association serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D HbA1c level diabetic patient chronic kidney disease . The investigator hypothesize serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D level negatively correlate HbA1c level .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D HbA1c Levels Diabetic Patients With CKD
DOC.detailed_description: This cross sectional study use consecutive sample methodology participant recruitment . It carry specialized diabetic , renal , general outpatient clinic University Malaya Medical Centre ( UMMC ) , Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia . Serum 25 ( OH ) D level determine use direct chemiluminesent immunoassay ( ADVIA Centaur XP ; Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics , Tarrytown , New York , USA ) . Serum HbA1c level determine use high-pressure liquid chromatography ( Variant™ II Turbo ; Bio-Rad , Hercules , California , USA ) . Data collect analyzed use Statistical Package Social Sciences SPSS version 23.0 Windows , version 23.0 ( IBM Corp. , Armonk , New York , USA ) .
DOC.criteria: eGFR 1559 ml/min/1.73m2 age ≥ 18 year old able provide inform consent active infection autoimmune disease malignancy immunosuppressive therapy vitamin D supplement
